readable.title: 2752331711_cb18abba5a
readable.content: A man sits in a camping chair near the edge of a rock face over a body of water . a man sits in a chair while holding a large pole . A man sits on a folding chair on big block of ice , holding on to a rope . Man sits on chair near edge of cliff fishing The man hold a pole in the air , while sitting close to the cliffs edge .
